name: Marion Lipschutz
introduction: Marion Lipschutz is an American documentary producer, writer, and director. Lipschutz has directed and produced award-winning documentaries, including BEI BEI, The Education of Shelby Knox and Young Lakota.[1]Marion Lipschutz works alongside Rose Rosenblatt as the co-director and producer of Incite Pictures the for profit arm of Cine Qua Non[2](a not for profit). She produces and directs feature documentaries that entertain, educate and explore critical contemporary issues.
